name: Bang Howdy!
tags: ['Turn-Based Tactics', 'Time Management', 'Real Time Tactics', 'PvE', 'PvP', 'Tutorial', 'Competitive', 'Real-Time', 'Turn-Based', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Tabletop', 'Character Customization', 'Strategy', '3D', 'Top-Down', 'Steampunk', 'Team-Based', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'Cartoony', 'Anime']
description: Bang! Howdy is an online strategy game. The setting mixes elements from a variety of related genres, such as steampunk or Native American myth. Several of the players' available units are entirely mechanical, including artillery and a "steam gunman", a robot boasting large wagon wheels for movement while wearing a cowboy hat.

name: an Orc's Tale: Kriegsruf
description: Die Geschichte eines jungen Orks in den Wirren eines Krieges, der zu gross für einen einzelnen Krieger ist. Storylastiges RPG im Stil der alten Klassiker, mit modernen Mitteln dargestellt, ohne den alten Charme zu verlieren mit etlichen handgestalteten Grafiken und Effekten.

name: Sommad
description: Sömmad gets you on an adventure in a self-overlapping VR maze to find a diamond with help of your friends outside VR. In this local multiplayer, walk freely in a large VR maze, make decisions with friends, and challenge your guiding skills using a mazy map!

name: Island Dash
description: You are controlling the Tourist through the whole Island. Your goal is to collect as much money as quickly as possible, so the Tourist can buy himself a Hotdog. If you are to slow and he runs out of calories, he will die. :( Do you think you can make it?

name: Dark Descent: The Blue Rose
description: An eternal war has been waging between the Light and the Darkness. Demons from the Abyss have attacked Skyworlds impenetrable gates many times over the centuries, every attempt had failed. Dameus, leader of the Abyss and all the demons that dwell in it, devised a plan to open a gate that leads to the Human world.

name: Heroes of Hammerwatch
tags: ['Roguelite', 'Action Roguelike', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Co-op', 'RPG', 'Multiplayer', 'Dungeon Crawler', 'Online Co-Op', 'Indie', 'Action', 'Adventure', '2D', 'Procedural Generation', 'Top-Down', 'Hack and Slash', 'Roguelike', 'Singleplayer', 'Bullet Hell', 'Action RPG', 'Fantasy']
description: Heroes of Hammerwatch is a rogue-lite action-adventure. Explore and battle your way through procedurally generated levels on your own or with up to 3 friends.

name: We Were Here Too
description: As your final hour approaches, a large structure looms up in the distance, towering above the relentless storm. Discover the truth behind this dark castle in a communication-based, cooperative puzzle adventure.

name: Medieval Shopkeeper Simulator
tags: ['Simulation', 'RPG', 'Adventure', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Management', 'Trading', 'Open World', 'Medieval', 'Indie', 'Early Access', 'Atmospheric', 'Resource Management', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Inventory Management', 'Singleplayer', 'Third Person']
description: Keep your stores afloat against unique threats like royal laws, wars and crazy fantasy events. Discover new items, craft, sell them, and create your Merchant Empire in the kingdom! - All in a hybrid 2D-3D style.

name: Outpost Zero
description: Outpost Zero blends the genres of Multiplayer Base Building Survival and Simulation games in a Sci-Fi universe. On a lawless alien world, robotic scouts are tasked with building an Outpost for human colonists. Command AI minions, colonize the planet, and survive the perils of Gaiya.

name: Splitgate
description: Splitgate is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer shooter that features player-controlled portals. This sci-fi shooter takes the FPS genre to a new dimension with its portal mechanics, delivering high-flying, multi-dimensional combat.

name: Symploké: La Leyenda de Gustavo Bueno
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Indie', 'Adventure', 'Point & Click', 'Comedy', 'Episodic', 'Political', 'Philosophical', 'Choose Your Own Adventure']
description: Symploké: The Legend of Gustavo Bueno is a classic point and click adventure set in a Spanish university and inspired in one of the most influential contemporary philosophers in the world. Play Chapter 1 and take care in your first day of class!

name: Full-On Paintball
description: Best first person shooter paintball game simulation ever! 32 Players Dedicated Servers, 20+ Maps, 10 Gametypes, 20+ Weapons, Character & Weapon Customization, Skills and Ranks! Enjoy.

name: Tekling
description: Become a robot, save the world. Jump and dodge your way through 70+ levels of frenetic gameplay in the same vein of super meet boy and megaman. Collect the orbs to transform from frail human into mighty Tekling, defender of the innocent and enemy to exploding barrels everywhere.

name: SAS: Zombie Assault 4
description: Purge the undead! Intense action-shooter with deep rpg elements, including upgradeable guns and armor, unique class skills, and class special abilities. Entire game can be played single player or as a 4-player online co-op game, including PvP events like Last Man Standing.

name: Uurnog Uurnlimited
description: Enter the wacky & whimsical world of Uurnog Uurnlimited! Explore a silly, puzzle-filled land full of cubes, bombs, weird people & adorable animals — then steal them all! Play single player or co-op as you jump, grab, throw & teleport your colorful collection back to the Save Room.

name: Farmer's Dynasty
description: Live – Build – Farm: Enjoy a unique mix of farming, constructing and life simulation that takes you to the countryside and holds plenty of challenging gameplay in stock!

name: Nox Dei
description: Nox Dei es un RPG de estilo retro con combates por turnos y sistemas variados orientado a la narrativa, totalmente gratuito y en el que encontrarás una gran aventura con el espíritu de los JRPG clásicos de los 90.

name: Solenars Edge Rebirth
description: Three lost orphans band together to set out on a journey that transcends the boundaries of imagination and retrieve the pieces of a legendary gem, all while keeping the darkness at bay alongside a colorful cast of unique characters.

name: aMAZE ZER0
description: aMAZE ZER0 is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with calm soundtrack.

name: Totally Mayhem
description: A huge city. You can drive cars, taxis, helicopters, vans, airplanes, many other vehicle types, shoot from turrets etc Complete missions, shoot with many weapons(pistol, shootgun, missile launcher, grenades), drive all vehicles, including cars tanks, helicopter, Each mission is unique, you will have to kill a number of enemies or a...

tags: ['Story Rich', 'Psychological Horror', 'Survival Horror', 'Atmospheric', 'First-Person', 'Horror', 'Adventure', 'Puzzle', 'Casual', 'Free to Play', 'RPG', 'Dark', 'Walking Simulator', 'Hidden Object', '3D Platformer', 'Exploration', 'Puzzle Platformer', '3D', 'Psychological', 'Stealth']

name: VR Triber
description: VR Triber is a VR online multiplayer social platform, where you can meet, communicate with and play with users from all over the world. You can also share your panorama with others to let them experience your world here.

name: Poker World
description: Poker World is brought to you by the makers of Governor of Poker. In this great offline poker game, you're battling and bluffing your way through several continents and famous poker cities. And you'll play poker with only one goal: to become the best poker player in the world.

name: Regions Of Ruin
tags: ['RPG', 'Adventure', 'Indie', 'Hack and Slash', 'Pixel Graphics', '2D', 'Side Scroller', 'Action RPG', 'Fantasy', 'Dungeon Crawler', 'Resource Management', 'Base Building', 'Building', '2D Platformer', 'Exploration', 'Atmospheric', 'Singleplayer', 'Platformer', 'Colony Sim', 'City Builder']

name: OUTRIDERS
tags: ['Looter Shooter', 'RPG', 'Co-op', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Action', 'Adventure', 'Multiplayer', 'Loot', 'Shooter', 'Singleplayer', 'Online Co-Op', 'Gore', 'Sci-fi', 'Violent', 'Open World', 'Third Person', 'Character Customization', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Story Rich', 'Sexual Content']

name: Plight
description: Delve into the immersive world of Plight, where darkness has consumed the planet, and its up to you to re-energize it! Challenge yourself with over 90 handcrafted levels that put your puzzle solving skills to the test!

name: Shooty Squad
description: Shooty Squad is a fast paced, competitive multiplayer first person shooter with hilarious graphics and ragdoll physics. With weapons and maps focused on being as balanced and competitive as possible ! Also has offline Zombie mode.

name: Descenders
description: Descenders is extreme downhill freeriding for the modern era, with procedurally generated worlds, and where mistakes have real consequences. Will you lead your team to glory and become the next legendary Descender?

name: Helium Rain
description: Trade your wares and eliminate the competition in a cutthroat world. Buy new ships and stations to mine and haul resources. Explore the vast emptiness of space.

name: Lumber King
description: You hate green.

name: Mayas' Virtual Brush
description: Mayas' Virtual Brush is as 3D Painting and Sculpting tool with a friendly interface and simple controls that allows you to create whole new worlds, achieving breath-taking results with just a few simple strokes.

name: Zeus' Battlegrounds
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Battle Royale', 'Early Access', 'Multiplayer', 'Action', 'Action RPG', 'Massively Multiplayer']
description: Zeus' Battlegrounds is no longer available.

name: Data Thief
description: Data Thief is a 3D VR puzzle game set in a technology-themed world where the player must solve a series of laser grid puzzles in order to steal priceless data. The more high priority the hard drive, the harder it is to bypass security measures!

name: Purgation
description: You awake gradually. You are in a dark cell. You are drifting in and out of consciousness between bouts of violent hallucinations. You are physically weak and have no memory of who you are or why you are here. You are alone and you are scared, very scared. The voices in your head tell you that you should be.

name: MineFight
description: MineFight is a party / fight game, 2 players on the same computer. Needing reflexes and speed and a few thoughts to kill before being killed ! The universe is inspired by the famous game "Minecraft" and its characters are inspired by French youtubeurs.

name: Drug Dealer Simulator
description: Have you ever thought about expanding your own crime empire, without the legal and moral consequences? SIMULATE IT! Crawl into the dark alleys of the drug dealing business. Now with SIX big free updates introducing new mechanics, maps, and dozens of gameplay hours.

name: GRIS
description: Gris is a hopeful young girl lost in her own world, dealing with a painful experience in her life. Her journey through sorrow is manifested in her dress, which grants new abilities to better navigate her faded reality.

name: BLOKDODGE
description: BLOKDODGE is a fast-paced block simulator based in a fantastic world of geometry. Are you edgy enough? Do you get the point? Can you master 90 degrees of fun? You must guide your shape through perilous levels of increasing difficulty to reach the ultimate goal.

name: CrownFall
description: CrownFall is an action game that will give you a thrilling battle experience. Overcome overwhelming bosses one after another; but it will never be easy.

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon Classic
description: Create incredible parks in the original rollercoaster sim from Chris Sawyer.

name: A Wonder

description: A WONDER is a 3rd person stealth/puzzle game set in a sunken city. Stuck in the depths of the sea, Alana will have to explore this dormant world in order to reactivate it. In doing so, she must remain hidden from lurking creatures, hostile to any outsider who dares to venture in this derelict place.
7 is a puzzle platformer, literally, by the numbers.

name: 月之暗面 The Dark Side Of The Moon
description: The dark style independent online game, the return of China's traditional round system game, farewell to the lengthy development upgrade, the players compete equality, the common face of the dark side of humanity.

name: Power War - The First Men
description: Power War - The First Men is a First Person Multiplayer game.

name: Bridge Constructor Portal
description: Enter the Aperture Science Enrichment Center and experience Bridge Constructor Portal – the unique merging of the classic Portal™ and Bridge Constructor™ games.

name: Surviving the Aftermath
description: Survive and thrive in a post-apocalyptic future — resources are scarce, but opportunity calls! Build the ultimate disaster proof colony, protect your colonists, and restore civilization to a devastated world.

name: Battlegun
description: Battlegun is a fun and online cartoon fps game. Create a room and kill the rival team. See more fun on multiple maps. Play now!

name: Seconds to Square
description: Seconds to Square is a momentum-based action-platformer where players draw boxes to manipulate time.

name: Alienzix
description: Oldschool 2Д-shooter of the Windows 2000 epoch, controlled by mouse. 2-player local cooperative mode with several difficulty levels.

description: Defend the transport ship from being captured by enemy waves on the way to the jump hole. Upgrade weapons, kill enemies, get cargo, transfer cargo, buy features, repeat.

description: Tactical-strategic turn-based card game, the key focus is on the player's ability to assess the situation and control the battlefield.

name: Cobos
description: 3rd person arena shooter which is so hard to be completed by weak players.

That is, unless the forest kills him first.(READ DESCRIPTION BEFORE PLAYING)

description: -Servers are going offline 12/29/20 for good! Thanks for your support!

name: Door Kickers: Action Squad
tags: ['Pixel Graphics', 'Action', 'Co-op', '2D', 'Indie', 'Local Co-Op', 'Tactical', 'Moddable', 'Multiplayer', 'Strategy', 'Retro', 'Casual', 'Zombies', 'Replay Value', 'Singleplayer', 'Soundtrack', '2D Platformer', 'Real Time Tactics', 'Shooter', 'Level Editor']
description: Rescue hostages, disarm bombs and save the day in this old school, side-scroller action game with retro graphics and retro sensibilities. Online and Couch Coop Included.

name: Kiitsu
description: In this beautiful low-poly world, the water of your village has stopped flowing... endangering all your people ! You'll need bravery, intelligence and observation to solve each puzzle and bring water back to Kiitsu. But will you be up to the task ?

name: Insanity VR: Last Score
description: Insanity VR combines an immersive and intuitive locomotion system in VR, a compelling horror story and escape the room like puzzles with stealth mechanics. As the new intern at a futuristic institute for mental illnesses you get transported into the mind of a patient to reconstruct his memories.

name: Hard Time
description: The toughest prison sim in the yard has been locked back up to serve another sentence in 2D!

name: Hell Let Loose
description: Join the ever expanding experience of Hell Let Loose - a hardcore World War Two first person shooter with epic battles of 100 players with infantry, tanks, artillery, a dynamically shifting front line and a unique resource based RTS-inspired meta-game.

name: Lost Items
description: You wake up lost in a maze and realize there are many items on the ground. They all seem high-valuable, so you decide to pick them all. But there are also many ghosts that don't really want you to pick the items. Not that they will try to kill you, but they'll steal and move the items...

name: Captivus
description: Join the movement! Build a deck, equip your ship, and take on others in intense 1v1 card battles!

name: AESCULAP® OrthoPilot®Elite VR Palpation
description: Assume the role of a surgeon during this gamified knee replacement surgery minigame in VR.

name: MINE!
description: This VR Shooting Gallery single player game has three levels of game play challenging you to defend the mine from invading forces. From your static vantage point you need to shoot as many aliens as possible, as fast as you can. Are you able to stop them stealing your crystals?

name: Avoid The Monsters
description: A mix of puzzle and (roguelike) RPG where your aim is to upgrade yourself as much as possible while.. avoiding the monsters!

name: Juniper's Knot
description: Juniper's Knot is a short (~30 mins) kinetic novel about the meeting of a demon and a boy. A kinetic novel is a game that uses text, sound, and illustrations to tell a story.

name: Epic Cards Battle 2-Dragons Rising(TCG)
description: 3D PVP Free Fantasy Strategy TCG Online Game！Experience the legendary battles. Hundreds of cards. 3 Card types: Creature, Spell, Trigger. Campaign and Arena and Ladder.

name: My Way VR
description: A 360 degree video player that enables you to watch videos from all over the world. It detects geographical location of the video, so you can choose the place you want to visit.

name: Head Goal: Soccer Online
description: Head Goal is an online multiplayer soccer game with 100% physics-based gameplay where you control one player.

name: Mothlight
description: In a world corrupted by Eldritch abominations, Enzo must climb out of the hellish depths of the universe. From the Black Sea to the Planes of Neethan, it is your job to make your pilgrimage back to the Worlds above. In the black hell of this world, only Moths and demons await you.

name: Pogostuck: Rage With Your Friends
description: Climb a surreal mountain on a pogo stick and make friends along the way.

name: JUMPER : SPEEDRUN
description: JUMPER : SPEEDRUN is a new Type of FPS Platformer crafted for the hardcore audience. Jump your way through insane levels, solve puzzles and try to finish fast.

name: Cyberoque
description: The game takes place in 2215. Suddenly terrible news has come from the outskirts of the solar system: our civilization was attacked by the alien armies. A terrible war begins, humanity is surrounded, enemy space ships press the earth's army.

name: Bad North
description: Bad North is a charming but brutal real-time tactics roguelite. Defend your idyllic island kingdom against a horde of Viking invaders, as you lead the desperate exodus of your people. Command your loyal subjects to take full tactical advantage of the unique shape of each island.

name: Rise of One
description: Rise of One is a free-to-play third person online action game. Fight everyone you confront with or team up with others and fight with the other teams! Customize your favorite character with your victories. Join the endless loop in the Uounus Castle !

name: Nightork Adventures 2 - Legacy of Chaos
tags: ['Action', 'Simulation', 'Arcade', 'Shooter', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Colorful', 'Voxel', 'Procedural Generation', 'Space', 'Demons', 'Sci-fi', 'Futuristic', 'Level Editor', 'Indie', 'Free to Play', '3D', 'Third Person', 'Singleplayer', 'Bullet Hell', 'Combat']
description: Nightork Adventures - Legacy of Chaos is an arcade shooter game. You fly with a spaceship through procedurally generated caves and fight against evil demons using magic colors. There is a campaign of 30 levels and 5 boss monsters. It also comes with a level editor, so you can create your own levels.

name: You Doesn't Exist
description: Set out on an adventure that challenges all the codes of the RPG genre, toying with its boundaries to create something unlike anything you've ever seen. In a world full of magic and adventure, a young boy starts his apprenticeship to become a knight... And it will change his life... and yours.

name: Microtransaction Simulator
description: Live your wildest dreams by splurging on insane amounts of cash you wouldn't have in real life. Play for random number generated loot that is a reflection of the meaningless nature of this game and everything surrounding it.

name: Madu Maths
description: Based on a school curriculum, Madu Maths tests primary school kids in addition and subtraction as they help bees collect honey for their hive. A solo developer effort, Madu Maths boasts challenging gameplay coupled with an original score and organic graphics to make for a fulfilling experience.

name: DUELEUM
description: DUELEUM is an action game that fights enemies by making full use of magic and sword. Let's survive using various techniques.

name: SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE
description: The long-awaited third game in the groundbreaking SUPERHOT franchise - MIND CONTROL DELETE gives you more insight into the world of SUPERHOT, more story, more signature gameplay. Keep dancing the slow-motion ballet of destruction for so much longer than ever before.

name: SORE
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Indie', 'Puzzle', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Atmospheric', 'Minimalist', 'Psychological Horror', 'Short', 'Experimental', 'Singleplayer', 'Controller', 'Linear', 'Silent Protagonist', 'Casual', 'Adventure', 'Side Scroller', 'Puzzle Platformer', 'Exploration', 'Hidden Object', '2D']
description: Mystical puzzle quest game in a gloomy minimalism style will tell you a story of a person who's got himself into a camera, and from which there is no way out it seems. Experimental gameplay diluted with a pinch of a philosophy, that's what SORE is.

name: Capsular
description: Capsular is a unique arena shooter featuring a "One shot, One Kill" mechanic. Jump into a fast paced match where your skill matters most!

name: Call Me Skyfish
description: Call Me Skyfish is a game about a fish, a stick-figure hedgehog, and a long tongue.

name: Endless Combat
description: Endless Combat, is a coop game which is about fighting as characters with unique skills against zombies, the game also contains free for all mode

name: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
description: The best-selling Trine series returns to the magic of 2.5D! Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

name: BOOKS
description: Test your knowledge of the animal world!

name: DiRT Rally 2.0
description: DiRT Rally 2.0 dares you to carve your way through a selection of iconic rally locations from across the globe, in the most powerful off-road vehicles ever made, knowing that the smallest mistake could end your stage.

name: Killing Floor: Incursion
description: Killing Floor: Incursion is a fully-realized, multi-hour, story-driven adventure with an additional endless mode. In solo or co-op mode, travel diverse environments, from creepy farmhouses to the catacombs of Paris, in order to uncover who... or what is behind the Zed menace.

name: Evening Surprise
description: Max and his girlfriend Ann are very happy together. They have no arguments, they enjoy spending time with each other, they are in love. What else can they wish? Well, Max, you will get a big surprise this evening...

name: Fog Of War - Free Edition
tags: ['Free to Play', 'World War II', 'Multiplayer', 'FPS', 'Action', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Singleplayer', 'Open World', 'Violent', 'Gore', 'Shooter', 'First-Person', 'Indie', 'Co-op', 'War', 'Controller', 'Zombies', 'Realistic', 'Survival']
description: Tactical Multiplayer FPS shooter with a story based on the events of the World War II. Strategic battles with a variety of vehicles, including artillery. Multiple game modes. Ranks, titles, awards, career.

name: Alchemage
description: You accidently stepped into a mysterious land and started an epic adventure only to return home. You build shelters, explore biomes, fight with monsters, and discover ancient ruins to uncover the myth of the world.

name: Space Fighter
description: A mini-game designed for split screen experiences with up to 8 players. Pilot your spaceship through an anti-gravity suspended asteroid field to destroy enemy targets. Summon wingmen to coordinate your team, unlock upgrades to increase your spaceship’s efficiency, all in objective or deathmatch modes.

name: Ash of Gods: Redemption
tags: ['Tactical', 'Dark Fantasy', 'Moddable', 'War', 'Lore-Rich', 'Story Rich', 'Medieval', 'Singleplayer', 'Class-Based', 'Choices Matter', 'RPG', 'Isometric', 'Magic', 'Fantasy', 'Strategy', 'Adventure', 'PvE', 'Multiple Endings', 'Turn-Based Tactics', 'Tactical RPG']
description: Ash of Gods: Redemption is a turn-based RPG that combines tactical combat, CCG elements, and a constantly evolving story in which no one is safe from death, including the main characters.

name: FPV Drone Simulator
description: This FPV Drone Simulator is especially designed for practicing your drone flying skills! Fly in different environments. Choose 'abandoned factory', 'free ride' or 'fantasy forest'.

name: MSI Electric City: Core Assault
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Action', 'Adventure', 'VR', 'Indie', 'Casual', 'Bullet Hell', 'Sci-fi', "Shoot 'Em Up", 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Arcade']
description: Rediscover MSI Electric City as you pilot a fighter ship with the mission to defend the city. Maneuver and blast away the enemy swarm in this VR bullet hell arcade shoot ’em up.

name: ArchRobo - Robotic Annihilation
tags: ['Indie', 'Action', 'Twin Stick Shooter', 'Robots', '2D', 'Retro', 'Top-Down Shooter', 'Local Co-Op', "Shoot 'Em Up", 'Sci-fi', 'Local Multiplayer', 'Arcade', 'Shooter', 'Co-op', 'Dungeon Crawler', 'Controller']
description: This is ArchRobo, a top-down shooter. Featuring incredible visuals, 28 intense levels ranging from easy to incredibly challenging, with 5 large Bosses, dozens of enemies, and a plethora of creative weapons such as the Laser Sword, and Juggernaut power-up.

name: aMAZE Dark Times
description: aMAZE Dark Times is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with cool soundtrack and timer!

name: Over The Moonlight
description: Lost and alone, you delve into an intriguing place.

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night
description: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night is an exploration-focused, side-scroller action RPG by Koji Igarashi. Play as Miriam, an orphan scarred by an alchemist's curse that slowly crystallizes her body. Battle through a demon-infested castle and defeat its master to save yourself, and all of humanity!

name: XXZ
description: Zombie Apocalypses turned out to be somewhat different from what science fiction authors used to write. Only women can turn into zombies. You are spending your holidays on a tropical island when Day Z comes. Your mission is to lead a group of three people who try to escape to the boat.

name: Panda Run
description: In this game your character is cute panda. Help Panda collect coins jumping on branches in the jungle. Also there is some rules in this strange jungle, you need to collect as much golden coins as you can see to pass 3 start barier at the end of a forest.

name: Fake World VR
description: Fake World® is an action-packed VR game in zero gravity. Fight through hordes of enemies, discover Fake World's unique movement systems, and uncover the truth about reality in this adrenaline pumping adventure.

name: Treasure At The Top
description: Slice monsters. Release energy balls. Uncover mysteries.

name: Containment Corps
description: The laser bow wielding security force has been called in. Fulfill your obligation to the Containment Corporation, keep the energy bases operational. Containment Corps mixes first person action with co-operative strategy and tower defense elements.

name: My Free Zoo
description: A small zoo needs your help! As the new manager, it's your job to boost business. Design the zoo of your dreams. From wolves and polar bears all the way to prehistoric beasts – the further you progress in the game, the more exotic the animals you'll be able to keep in your zoo. Play now and save the zoo!

name: Mobile Zombie
description: This is a single-player, narrative based, casual advertising game.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War
tags: ['Action', 'Zombies', 'Shooter', 'Multiplayer', 'Co-op', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Third Person', 'Singleplayer', 'Gore', 'Adventure', 'Sniper', 'PvE', 'Horror', 'Violent', 'Alternate History', 'World War II', 'Combat', 'Dark', 'Demons', 'Open World']
description: Hitler’s hordes are back for more in this spine-chilling shooter from the makers of Sniper Elite 4! Abominable occult enemies, epic weapons and a harrowing new campaign for 1-4 players await in 1940s Europe, as you fight to save humankind from undead Armageddon!

name: Audio Forager
description: Feel the magic of Machine Learning in this new experiment that combines over 44,000 sounds from Freesound.org, a data set created by Kyle McDonald and a touch of Cabbibo weirdness. Run your hands through a cloud of sound, select your favorite clips and make a drum set from this aural smorgasbord!

name: Veritex
description: Veritex is a multiplayer survival game. The goal is to survive versus the wilderness around you, build bases, and fend off other players that can murder you and take your loot.

name: Matchville
description: Matchville - your dream town. Complete three-in-a-row levels to advance the plot, make new friends and decorate picturesque locations. Your own cafe is already waiting for you!

name: Necromancer Accountant
description: Necromancer accountant. Undead scourge tycoon simulation game.

name: Fear For Freedom
description: "Two days ago a monster appeared in the hallway outside the office. Maybe if I just wait it will leave eventually." A very short psychological game dealing with isolation, entrapment and the nature of fear.

name: LINX BATTLE ARENA
description: Fast paced Third Person Shooter action across a range of CQB and open area maps. Starting with 1 gun and half health you will always be aware of how vulnerable you are. Play challenging single player games or invite friends to private mutiplayer games.

name: Idle Bouncer
description: Make the balls jump, upgrade and change the world! Drop the balls to generate energy with each bounce. Upgrade available balls and buy new ones to generate even more energy. Sell your balls empire to get meta-energy to change the world!

name: FPS - Fun Puzzle Shooter
description: FPS - Fun Puzzle Shooter is a first person game with a totally different proposal. Here the objective is not to kill other creatures, but to hit the correct targets to finish the levels.

name: Cute Monsters Battle Arena
description: Massively addictive turn based strategy RPG with intense action & puzzles.

name: Pyramaze The Game
description: Kill lots of enemies while listening to kick-ass metal and get the highest score!

name: All Our Asias
description: A free game from the co-creator of Anodyne. Explore someone's mind and discover their secrets in this surreal, PSX-like adventure about a father, son, Asian-America and race. Control Yuito as you explore his dying father's "Memory World" - what supernatural things will you discover?

name: Z Runaway
description: A simple and fun arcade. Get on the mad speed in the van, get the money on the road! And try not to break up and lose everything you've been able to gain from your long life at the warm, sunny shore of the sea.

name: Scorn
description: Scorn is an atmospheric first-person horror adventure game set in a nightmarish universe of odd forms and somber tapestry.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club
tags: ['Psychological Horror', 'Visual Novel', 'Anime', 'Free to Play', 'Dating Sim', 'Horror', 'Cute', 'Dark', 'Story Rich', 'Romance', 'Singleplayer', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Gore', 'Violent', 'Indie', 'Sexual Content', 'Memes', 'First-Person', 'Casual', 'Adventure']
description: The Literature Club is full of cute girls! Will you write the way into their heart? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Millidor
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Strategy', 'Early Access', 'Turn-Based', 'PvP', 'Multiplayer', 'Building', 'RPG', 'Grand Strategy', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'Real-Time', 'Singleplayer', 'Magic', 'War', 'Fantasy', 'Open World', 'Action', 'RTS', 'MMORPG']
description: Миллидор – глобальная клиентская онлайн стратегия в лучших традициях классического fantasy. Миллидор дает возможность стать правителем своего королевства. Суровым, деспотичным воякой или, наоборот, дипломатичным торговцем – выбор за вами!

name: World War Z
tags: ['Zombies', 'Multiplayer', 'Online Co-Op', 'Action', 'Co-op', 'Singleplayer', 'Shooter', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'FPS', 'PvE', 'Survival Horror', 'Gun Customization', 'Character Customization', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Gore', 'First-Person', 'Violent', 'Combat', 'Third Person', 'Class-Based']
description: World War Z is a heart-pounding coop third-person shooter for up to 4 players featuring massive swarms of hundreds of zombies, focused on fast-paced, gruesomely spectacular action.

name: Keyboard Killers
description: Keyboard Killers is a difficult reflex game in which you destroy meteors in order to save your starship and your friend dragon(^-^) . You must be very fast to able to complete the game. More then 500 apm on most challenging levels.

name: Feudal Alloy
description: Feudal Alloy is an epic action adventure with fish-controlled medieval robots! Explore an unusual medieval world with a fish-controlled robot, Attu. Improve your combat techniques and skills by smashing many kinds of mechanical creatures in a beautiful hand-drawn world.

name: Timension
description: Timension is a puzzle game in which players are able to reverse time to 15 seconds ago to finish the mission impossible.

name: RideOp
description: RideOp puts you in control of some of the biggest and most thrilling theme park rides in the world. Give all your guests the most unforgettable experience! With full control of the ride's motion, you can offer a unique journey every ride. Now it's your turn to create thrilling experiences!

name: Despotism 3k
tags: ['Strategy', 'Indie', 'Dark Humor', 'Sexual Content', '2D', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Simulation', 'Difficult', 'Singleplayer', 'Replay Value', 'Perma Death', 'Roguelite', 'Roguelike', 'Resource Management', 'Violent', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Management', 'Villain Protagonist', 'Cyberpunk', 'Great Soundtrack']
description: Humanity is enslaved by an AI… which is awesome, because we’re on the right side of the conflict. Exploit puny humans to extract power and build your own empire!

name: Deserving Life
description: Deserving Life is a room-scale virtual reality escape game for the HTC Vive and was developed by students in the Media Technology and Design program at the Hagenberg Campus of the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria. Can you find a way out of your misery?

name: SCP: Secret Laboratory
description: Deep within the SCP Foundation during a containment breach, many of the anomalies have bypassed security and escaped from their chambers - without peaceful intentions. Become site personnel, a re-containment agent, or an anomalous entity and fight to take control of or escape the facility!

name: Microsoft Allegiance
tags: ['Team-Based', 'Free to Play', 'Space Sim', 'FPS', 'RTS', 'Multiplayer', 'Action', 'Competitive', 'Real Time Tactics', 'Wargame', 'PvP', '3D Fighter', 'Strategy', 'Space', 'Economy', 'War', 'Physics', 'Combat', 'Old School', 'Online Co-Op']
description: Allegiance is a team-based multiplayer space combat sim that seamlessly combines first-person space combat with a top-down-view perspective, real time strategy, and real time tactics. Team commanders build bases, research technology, and coordinate players to execute a wide range of strategies.

name: Beyond the Void
description: Beyond the Void is a new hybrid strategy game in space, with RTS and MOBA mechanics. It's F2P. Experience the thrill of being a Captain and lead epic space wars in 1 vs1. Design your own strategy and fleet to become the one who'll dominate the galaxy!

name: Ghostly Horizon
description: Ghostly Horizon is an intense 3rd-person spell-caster on round planets. You enjoy crazy battles with over 30 different spells, preferably together with your friends. Focus is placed on both player-skill and teamwork in this matchbased game with quick rounds. Can you top the Leaderboards?

name: Evil Genius 2
description: A satirical spy-fi lair builder where YOU are the criminal mastermind! Construct your base, train your minions, defend your operations from the Forces of Justice, and achieve global domination!

name: Gurugedara
description: Guru Gedara is a leading platform for interacting with the teachers and students. Meet friends and attend classes in a virtual environment.

name: Amoreon NightClub
description: The Amoreon NightClub is a single player disco, where you can dance with virtual characters, challenge yourself to gain points by following the dance moves, select songs and add your own music. You can see your own VR body, use your hands and fingers with thumb sticks.

name: Kingdom Two Crowns
tags: ['2D', 'Local Co-Op', 'Side Scroller', 'Online Co-Op', 'Atmospheric', 'Tower Defense', 'Controller', 'Base Building', 'City Builder', 'Colony Sim', 'Sandbox', 'Medieval', 'Survival', 'Strategy', 'RPG', 'Building', 'Simulation', 'Singleplayer', 'Horses', 'War']
description: In Kingdom Two Crowns, players must work in the brand-new solo or co-op campaign mode to build their kingdom and secure it from the threat of the Greed. Experience new technology, units, enemies, mounts, and secrets in the next evolution of the award-winning micro strategy franchise!

name: Phantom Jump
description: Phantom Jump is a skill based platformer with rhythm mechanics, built to turn you into a speedrunner.

name: Splat the Blob
description: Join Splat the Blob on a cute adventure of helping Wilbur the elephant. Unlock new skills and zones by tackling obstacles and climbing to the top of the world.

name: Dawn of a Soul
description: Dawn of a Soul is a mathematical puzzle game about creating perfectly balanced paths by building chains and combos.

name: Fish's Trip
description: Fish's Trip is a spin off of the game Kabitis, where Flop fish, of that game, is the main protagonist of this.

name: Project Mercury
description: Make your way on foot, on a hoverbike, up skyscrapers, and down bottomless pits, as you exterminate a threat of unknown origin!

name: Rocketboat - Pilot
description: Far beyond the reaches of the Milky Way, a great darkness is looming. A clandestine force using powerful social manipulation techniques is controlling the resources of star systems throughout the universe. Their only existential threat appears to be a rock band from the planet Earth.

name: March of Empires
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Wargame', 'Medieval', 'War', 'Strategy', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'PvP', '4X', 'Base Building', 'Action RTS', 'Action', 'RTS', 'Co-op', 'City Builder', 'Real Time Tactics', 'Crafting', 'RPG', '3D', 'Top-Down', 'Character Customization']
description: Claim your title as Shogun, Highland King, Northern Tsar or Desert Sultan and join this genre-redefining strategy game where you will wage constant war for real territorial conquest! Fortify your castle, fuel a massive army, and enter the ultimate fight for realm domination!

name: Donut County
description: Donut County is a story-based physics puzzle game where you play as an ever-growing hole in the ground. Meet cute characters, steal their trash, and throw them in a hole.

name: Shooty Skies
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Action', 'Indie', 'Funny', "Shoot 'Em Up", 'Colorful', 'Arcade', 'Singleplayer', 'Fast-Paced', 'Voxel', 'Cute', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Retro', 'Casual', 'Bullet Hell', 'Shooter', 'Multiplayer', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Family Friendly', 'Dragons']
description: The creators of Crossy Road present Shooty Skies! Shoot, dodge, duck, goose and weave. Take to the skies!

name: NewTypes
description: Simulation game of virtual spacecraft. VR(Vive) version and non VR version are included.

name: Planet Zoo
description: Build a world for wildlife in Planet Zoo. From the developers of Planet Coaster and Zoo Tycoon comes the ultimate zoo sim. Construct detailed habitats, manage your zoo, and meet authentic living animals who think, feel and explore the world you create around them.

name: 冒险之路(Adventure Road)
description: A global service, real-time combat Strategy Role-Playing online games(SRPG).

name: Run, my little pixel
description: This is the runner-game divided into three layers. Here you must avoid barriers and cope with the enemies. You will come across many exciting levels and hardcore bosses. The game is made in the style of Flat.

name: Star Rangers VR - Free Demo
description: This free demo of Star Rangers VR is a short adventure set in orbit around the earth. The full Star Rangers game, to be released in five episodes (to start) has more missions, vehicles and adventures! Help us hit 30,000 demo users to kick off funded development.

name: Our End of the World
description: Filled with puzzles, the story between she and me at the end of the world. English Subtitle Released on 2018/11/22!

name: GRID (2019)
description: GRID is a racing experience like no other. Offering unrivalled wheel-to-wheel racing for everyone, where every race is unpredictable as you create rivals and nemeses on your road to conquering the world of motorsport.

name: Star Wars: Imperial Assault - Legends of the Alliance
description: Legends of the Alliance is a companion app for the Star Wars: Imperial Assault board game, a scenario-based game of tactical combat. When you play with Legends of the Alliance, the app assumes the role of the Imperials, while you and your friends form a team of Rebel heroes fighting to bring down the Galactic Empire.

name: Castle Clicker
description: Castle Clicker is a more strategy focused clicking game that required you to think about how to manage your resources and build your city. If you're looking for a more in depth but still casual clicking game, this is for you!

name: Edge Of Existence
description: Edge Of Existence. Is a throw back to the Classics of RTS where you can build up your base and build up your massive army. Ranging from Ground units , Air Units and Sea Units. We also take you on a story base RTS where a faction has a meaning to the map or why its in-game. We are a balance focus on PvP, PvE and Story/Campaign.

name: The Chronicles of Nyanya
description: A sweet jRPG-style game about cats, brutal massacres, cuteness, racism and social issues, friendship, sinister thoughts, hilarity and Nazi furniture. It’s an epic attempt to blow your mind with adult themes hidden behind bright cartoon graphics.

name: Generation Zero®
description: Generation Zero is a stealth-action shooter where you wage guerilla warfare against lethal mechanical enemies. Explore a vast open world map inspired by the Swedish Cold War era, take part in the resistance alone or with up to three friends in seamless co-op.

name: Thief Simulator
description: Become the best thief. Gather intel, steal things and sell them to buy hi-tech equipment. Do everything that a real thief does.

name: HAWKEN REBORN
description: Return to the world of high-octane mech combat in Hawken Reborn. Construct your ultimate war machine and shoot your way through hordes of enemies to uncover the mysteries of Ilall in this brand-new Free-to-Play PVE mech game.

name: DeathComing
description: 'Death Coming' is a non-linear puzzle game where you must harvest human souls ‘Final Destination’ style. However, pesky mortals are not your only problem, as the Agents of Light will do everything they can to stop you.

name: Cube Racer
description: Cube Racer is a round based multiplayer racing game with cubes. Every round, all players race against each other to the finish line. Before every round, the players get to build one or more obstacles on the map. In the next round, all players have to pass all the obstacles, which have been built yet.

name: Tactical Monsters Rumble Arena
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Strategy', 'RPG', 'Indie', 'Adventure', 'Turn-Based', 'Multiplayer', 'Tactical', 'Card Game', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Turn-Based Tactics', 'PvP', 'Tactical RPG', 'Action', 'Casual', 'Simulation', 'Singleplayer', 'Early Access', 'Hex Grid']
description: Are you ready to RUMMMBLE?

name: The Cursed Tower
description: "The Cursed Tower" is a story-driven platformer game where you are a dutiful postal worker. Armed with only a letter opener and graceful jumping skills, you must embark on a quest and fulfill your duty. Along the way, you will encounter many dangers and uncover a dark secret. Do you have what it takes?

name: World War Party: Game Of Trump
description: World War Party: Game of Trump is a deathmatch battle played by two teams of 4 players each (humans or bots). But the teams are not alone on the battlefield: PRESIDENT TRUMP drives around in his mighty ‘murican tank shooting lasers and talking nonsense.

name: Astroe
description: Multiplayer player 2D space battle. Collect gold, team up and take over the other team's satellites.

name: Wuxing Master 五行师(CCG)
description: "Wuxing Master 五行师(CCG)" is a multiplayer online Collectible Card Game(CCG) which is based on Chinese traditional myths. Its rules and numerical value have been honed for ten years. Now the game is available for Windows, Android and iOS, on each of which can you share the data.

name: SpaceWalker

You have to build an defense line with towers and upgrade them to stay alive as long as possible. when you die the map resets but you get a few special points depending on how long you survived.

name: Shark Simulator

In this world the impossible is now possible and you are invited to discover the games and enjoy this whimsical scenery.

name: Reverie
description: An ambient, very simple game* with pseudo-puzzle elements, something you can leave open on a second monitor while you work.

description: Renters have gone mad and they are coming to kill you. And why would they want to do that? Haven’t you always been a fair LANDLORD? Ah…nope! So call it justice, call it a cruel taste of revenge, or maybe just a terrible nightmare. Either way your life hangs by a thread.

name: Deathmatch Soccer

description: Bitcoin Сollector: spinners attack is a colorful game in which you must avoid traps, evade spinners and collect bitcoin's, changing gravity and teleporting at your own discretion.

description: Light of Mine will leave your head spinning in terror. Experience 360 degrees of VR terror as you use your candle to explore an ancient temple with danger lurking in the darkness. Light of Mine is made by nonPareil Studios. We are a studio that provides better futures for adults on the autism spectrum. #PoweredbyAutism

name: RAD
description: RAD is a 3D action rogue-like set in a post-post-apocalyptic world, where humanity has faced armageddon not once, but twice.

name: Audio Factory
description: Audio Factory is a VR experience (Daydream port) showcasing spatial audio capabilities of the Resonance Audio SDK by Google. Explore each floor to experience how spatial audio contributes to the VR immersion. Requires: headphones (Bluetooth not supported) and Vive/Oculus Touch controllers.

name: Fatal Velocity: Physics Combat

name: Orbital Racer
description: A unique combination of space and racing sims. Choose between fast-paced, explosive action or more realistic simulation where drifting around every corner becomes more than just a gimmick - it's a necessity. Race around distinct locations such as the rings of Saturn or orbital city on Venus.

description: Manage a game studio from the dawn of the gaming industry in 1976. Your journey starts with small indie titles and grows into a gaming empire. Develop, design, and conquer the industry. From humble beginnings to gaming legend – it’s your story, your studio, your legacy!

name: Star Wars: Droid Repair Bay
tags: ['Free to Play', 'VR', 'Robots', 'Adventure', 'Sci-fi', 'Casual', 'Short', 'First-Person', 'Multiplayer', 'Singleplayer', 'Survival', 'Strategy', 'Action', 'Atmospheric', 'Open World', 'Indie', 'Interactive Fiction', 'Immersive Sim', 'Local Multiplayer', 'Nudity']
description: In Star Wars: Droid Repair Bay by ILMxLAB, Poe Dameron's sidekick needs your help. Repair BB-8 and his astromech droid friends, each with their own unique personalities, so they can roll back into the fight against the First Order.

name: Arcade Moonlander
description: Explore space and race against the clock in this retro styled adventure game.

name: Scrap
description: Shoot, kick, and detonate your way through a post tech apocalyptic wasteland where robots reign terror upon the resourceful Scrappers. Scrap foes, unlock weapons, play alone or with friends and take back the world in this free, 3D, action, twin stick, shooter.

name: Major League Gladiators
description: Major League Gladiators is a 2-player co-op shooter for VR. Each taking control of one of two classes, players will have to survive endless rounds of enemies by combining their unique movement and combat abilities as well as maintaining each others resources.

name: Void Memory
description: You, who was born in a world full of darkness, should wander this hollowed land to find the Relics for a person who created you. However, fallen and lost souls with trap-filled trials await in your course of doing so. Can you survive in this crumbling world and start a new era?

name: Shiver
description: Welcome to Windy Oaks National Park. A beautiful and chilling point-and-click horror adventure. On your way to visit your aging father, everything goes wrong, leaving you trapped and isolated.

name: Islands of Nyne: Battle Royale
description: Drop into massive, alien-built arenas and begin the frantic search for weapons and gear - all while trying to stay one step ahead of the advancing plasma field… or the sights of other contenders. ION offers its players a skill-driven, first-person-only Battle Royale all built into a unique sci-fi universe.

name: Holyday City: Reloaded
tags: ['Funny', 'Capitalism', 'Casual', 'Clicker', 'Free to Play', 'Idler', '2D', 'City Builder', 'Simulation', 'Singleplayer', 'Building', 'Management', 'Cartoon', 'Cartoony', 'Time Management', 'Colorful', 'Text-Based', 'Resource Management', 'Point & Click', 'Isometric']
description: Build, manage & grow your city in Holyday City: Reloaded! An idle clicker game where you're the business tycoon, expanding your metropolis. Master resource & time management to upgrade businesses and thrive. Experience the ultimate town builder adventure with Holyday City.

name: Sniper Elite V2 Remastered
tags: ['Sniper', 'Action', 'World War II', 'Multiplayer', 'Gore', 'Violent', 'Stealth', 'Singleplayer', 'Co-op', 'Shooter', 'FPS', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'War', 'Third Person', 'Tactical', 'Open World', 'Co-op Campaign']
description: In the dark days of the end of World War 2 amidst the ruins of Berlin, one bullet can change history… Elite sniper Karl Fairburne returns to the front line in the remaster of this award-winning stealth-action experience. Packed with new features, contemporary visuals and definitive content.

name: San Matias - Mafia City
description: Time is running out! You play as a man named "The Canario". Fight hordes of enemies and try to survive in this city without laws. It's time to teach them a lesson!

name: Overcooked! 2
tags: ['Multiplayer', 'Online Co-Op', 'Local Co-Op', 'Co-op', 'Casual', 'Funny', 'Cooking', 'Indie', '4 Player Local', 'Local Multiplayer', 'Action', 'Family Friendly', 'Cute', 'Controller', 'Comedy', 'Difficult', 'Singleplayer', 'Simulation', 'Strategy', 'Colorful']
description: Overcooked returns with a brand-new helping of chaotic cooking action! Journey back to the Onion Kingdom and assemble your team of chefs in classic couch co-op or online play for up to four players. Hold onto your aprons… it’s time to save the world again!

name: Borderlands GOTY Enhanced
tags: ['FPS', 'Co-op', 'Shooter', 'First-Person', 'Online Co-Op', 'Loot', 'Action', 'RPG', 'Comedy', 'Dark Humor', 'Action RPG', 'Gore', 'Singleplayer', 'Looter Shooter', 'Multiplayer', 'Atmospheric', 'Sci-fi', 'Funny', 'Character Action Game', 'Violent']
description: Discover the original co-op shooter-looter, crammed with new enhancements! As one of 4 trigger-happy mercenaries with RPG progression, equip bazillions of guns to take on the desert planet Pandora.

name: Turtle: Voidrunner
description: After committing honorable seppuku Turtle finds himself in hell. The objective of this platformer is to reach a goal speed. Meaning small mistakes are fine and there is no restarting or death. Instead players find themselves entering a zen-like flow as they attempt to achieve maximum velocity.

name: Malzbie's Pinball Collection
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Casual', 'Simulation', 'Indie', 'Sports', 'Pinball', 'Arcade', '3D', 'Realistic', 'Survival Horror', 'Retro', "1990's", 'Score Attack', 'Singleplayer', 'Quick-Time Events', 'First-Person', 'Old School', 'Gaming', 'VR']
description: Malzbie’s Pinball Collection presents pinball tables in the style of the 1990s. Completely physically calculated gaming features, realistic graphics, stunning sounds and the animated dot matrix display give the feeling of the good old days back to you!

name: Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition
tags: ['Action', 'Indie', 'Top-Down', 'Top-Down Shooter', 'Zombies', '2D', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Singleplayer', "Shoot 'Em Up", 'Gore', 'Horror', 'Twin Stick Shooter', 'Score Attack', 'Replay Value', 'Arcade', 'Difficult', 'GameMaker', 'Adventure', 'Bullet Hell', 'Destruction']
description: Blackout Z' is a super fast top-down view shooter where you face ZOMBIES, SAWS and the DARK. Do you have what it takes to have what it takes to survive the zombie apocalypse with only your gun and an old flashlight?

name: Travel VR
description: “If we were meant to stay in one place, we would have roots rather than feet!”

name: JunkerBot
description: JunkerBot is a Single-Player Car Combat game, where you destroy, recycle, and replicate vehicles. But why? to Decontaminate!

name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 9
tags: ['Action', 'Hack and Slash', 'Open World', 'Musou', 'Historical', 'Multiplayer', 'Action RPG', 'Singleplayer', 'Anime', 'Co-op', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Adventure', 'Third Person', "Beat 'em up", 'RPG', 'Online Co-Op', 'Sexual Content']
description: Experience the thrill of one versus thousands in an all new open world setting with DYNASTY WARRIORS 9! Travel through Ancient China depicted on a single, vast, open-world map, master the new State Combo System, and watch the Three Kingdoms story unfold through a cast of 90 playable characters!

name: Hammer 2
description: Hammer 2 Reloaded is an action game in the third person where you will incarnate Hammer a hero of modern times! Take your rifle and kill anyone who gets in your way!

name: The Curse of Monkey Island
description: The only pirate adventure that asks the question: What's sharper, your sword or your wit?

name: Coffee Run
description: Coffee Run is a 3D endless runner game in which you run through the city and collect coffee, coffee, and more coffee. The more you drink, the faster you run. Don't let your caffeine meter drop too low or you'll slow to a grinding halt! Also, watch out for the oncoming traffic!

name: Snake: Road to apple
description: Snake: Road to Apple snake is a nice classic game. Eating apples, earn points. Earn a maximum of points!

name: Crash Bandicoot™ N. Sane Trilogy
description: Your favorite marsupial, Crash Bandicoot™, is back! He’s enhanced, entranced and ready-to-dance with the N. Sane Trilogy. Relive all your favorite moments in Crash Bandicoot™, Crash Bandicoot™ 2: Cortex Strikes Back and Crash Bandicoot™ 3: Warped, now in fully-remastered graphical glory!

name: Flightless Classic
description: Flightless is a tile-based puzzle adventure game. Navigate your way through a series of floating islands, each presenting a curious puzzle. A minimalist art style and calming piano soundtrack complement senses of wonder and discovery.

name: Fly Destroyer
description: Do you hate flies? Then this game is for you! Flies .. they are everywhere! Arm yourself and destroy them all!

name: Hinterhalt
description: Command your army on the battlefield, build your own base and lead your nation to victory at all costs!

name: FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S: HELP WANTED
description: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted is a collection of classic and original mini-games set in the Five Nights universe. Experience the horror in flat (non-VR) mode or VR. Oculus Rift and HTC Vive are supported. A VR Headset is NOT required to play.

name: War Trigger 2
description: Destroy, smash and blast your way to victory. Use advanced weapons and vehicles to dominate the battlefield.

name: Pairs
description: A visual novel about walking a mile in another man's shoes. On Earth. During an alien invasion.

name: Sudoku Universe
description: Making the best Sudoku game on Steam.

name: Mustache Politics Shooter
description: Play this awesome meme shooter and destroy fictional zombie politics who has ruined the world and safe all money

name: Fragments
description: Fragments is an asymetrical VR/desktop game where 2 players fight each other to save their planet. Win after an intense battle with your friends, take as many fragments as you can in a time trial or quietly explore the universe of the game to extend the experience without any pressure.

name: Flora
description: Flora is a mixed genre of action, adventure, and real time strategy. Explore the universe of Flora, a whimsical world full of vibrant colors and lovable creatures waiting to be saved by Twig, a head strong girl and her companion Red, a sapling Grand Guardian wise beyond his years.

name: Not Tonight
tags: ['Simulation', 'Life Sim', 'Pixel Graphics', 'RPG', 'Political', 'Alternate History', 'Dystopian', 'Politics', 'Indie', 'Singleplayer', 'Adventure', '2D', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Story Rich', 'Multiple Endings', 'Retro', 'Difficult', 'Replay Value', 'Addictive', 'Casual']
description: Person of European Heritage #112: Welcome to Relocation Block B, your new home. Your designated role is 'Bouncer'. Work hard, stay out of trouble, and we might let you stay in the UK.

name: King of the Eggs
description: Play with your friends Online for FREE using Steam Remote Play. Welcome to Eggorias! A land where you and your friends will compete in the wildest most exciting egg smashing competition the world has ever seen.

name: I Can't Believe It's Not Gambling GOTY Edition
description: Do you love opening loot crates, but hate the tedious gameplay sessions in between? Our marketing department has the game for you! Unbox random items! Get stuff, but not what you really want! Skate legal and ethical lines! Remember kids, its only a video game, so grab your parents credit card!

name: Legendary DXP
description: Welcome to the fantastical world of Alamyth where you can recruit all new legendary heroes and fight the terrifying forces of evil. Visit all new landscapes of Alamyth such as the Firelands and fight the likes of The Leprechaun Henchmen and the evil villain, Ernak The Lethal.

name: Wheel Riders Online OBT
description: Wheel Riders Online - Survival Racing. You will build your own mode transportation using the parts in your garage and battle other players online! A very entertaining automobile building system is waiting for you, don't let your fantasy limit you; moreover, those constant improvements are adding to your abilities.

name: BattleRush
tags: ['Free to Play', 'World War II', 'Multiplayer', 'FPS', 'Survival', 'Action', 'Shooter', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Adventure', 'Indie', 'Open World', 'First-Person', 'Crafting', 'Singleplayer', 'Zombies', 'Battle Royale', 'Early Access', 'Strategy', 'Horror', 'Co-op']
description: Free-to-play multiplayer action game in the entourage of the Second World War with total destructibility of the environment. Enjoy full freedom, build a defense, create your army, crush the enemy.

name: PickCrafter
description: Conquer PickCrafter, the hit indie idle game! Break blocks, forge equipment, and collect powerful Pickaxes. Prestige to legendary tiers with the new Ascension Skill Tree. Discover biomes and battle epic bosses. Make meaningful choices and invent complex builds in this addictive endless adventure!

name: Eternal Hour: Golden Hour
description: Play through a timeless adventure as Yasu or Rin Fujimoto and discover the origins of Eternal Hour! Eternal Hour: Golden Hour is a fun, emotional, and story-driven Visual Novel that takes place before the events of Eternal Hour.

name: Highway Madness
description: Highway Madness is a social VR game where you get to play with old and new friends from all over the world! Pick your character then choose from a selection of fun games including Standoff, Road Crossing, Roof jumping and Shootout! So what are you waiting for? Come on in and join the Madness!

name: Time Killers: CatchOut
description: CatchOut is a simple “Ball & Paddle” game, but without the paddle. Instead you move the bricks to catch the ball.

name: Time Killers: Spot Race
description: Spot Race is a little simple pair based puzzle game, which can been played when you are short in time.

name: Project Rhombus
description: Project Rhombus is a rhythm-based casual action game that combines exciting electronic music with stylish flat design. Hold on as long as possible, blocking the oncoming arrows moving to the beat.

name: 11-11 Memories Retold
tags: ['Adventure', 'Casual', 'World War I', 'Story Rich', 'Historical', 'Singleplayer', 'War', 'Atmospheric', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Walking Simulator', 'Third Person', 'Stylized']
description: 11th November 1916, a young photographer leaves Canada to join the western front in Europe. The same day, a German technician is told that his son is missing in action. Both want to preserve their humanity and come back alive to their loved ones.

name: Cyber Surf
description: Cyber Surf allows you to race through the air and explore different worlds using your favorite VR headset.

name: Trailer Park Boys: Greasy Money
description: Trailer Park Boys: Greasy Money is an idle clicker game where you run Sunnyvale Trailer Park. Upgrade your businesses and hire characters to run them while you’re gone. Complete challenges to unlock trunks and bust them open for collectible cards, liquor, hash and cash.

name: Chinese Parents
description: In this casual sim set in China, you step into the shoes of an average kid from birth towards the end of your high school. Study hard, have fun, make friends and face your ultimate challenge, the “Gaokao”. What will your life be after that? And when you have a child, will you be a Tiger Parent?

name: Baba Is You
description: Baba Is You is a puzzle game where the rules you have to follow are present as blocks you can interact with. By manipulating them, you can change how the game works, repurpose things you find in the levels and cause surprising interactions!

name: Operation: Harsh Doorstop
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Military', 'FPS', 'Multiplayer', 'Realistic', 'Action', 'Tactical', 'Shooter', 'Simulation', 'Strategy', 'War', 'Singleplayer', 'First-Person', 'Casual', 'Early Access', 'Wargame', 'World War II', 'Indie', 'Moddable', 'Cold War']
description: Operation: Harsh Doorstop is an Unreal Engine powered shooter sandbox similar to mod-friendly games like Ravenfield and Garry's Mod but with roots in tactical shooters like Squad and Arma III. Our game is entirely donation funded, completely free, and has full Steam workshop support!

name: aMAZE Double
description: aMAZE Double is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with portal and gem's

name: We. The Revolution
description: As a judge of the Revolutionary Tribunal, preside over complicated cases of ordinary citizens, dangerous criminals, and enemies of the revolution in revolutionary Paris. Make judgments, plot political intrigue, and try to not lose your own head!

name: Moose Invasion
description: Moose Invasion is a classic style arcade game in which you take on oversized native Canadian wildlife that use magic crystals to harness the powers of force fields, telekinesis and shooting lasers from their eyes.

name: Journey to Luonto
description: A RPG game that involves killing monsters, bosses, and completing the main quest line as well as the secondary quest line

name: Bernackels' Shoggoth
description: Shoggoth is a multiplayer (4vs2) stealth game, in which the player takes on the role of a small dragon. With the ability to fly and to morph into items, your mission is either to seek and kill your opponents or to search for keys and escape the level.

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Horror', 'Singleplayer', 'Robots', 'Survival Horror', 'Simulation', 'Difficult', 'Indie', 'First-Person', 'Strategy', 'Story Rich', 'Psychological Horror', 'Management', 'Funny', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Atmospheric', 'Retro', 'Memes', 'Family Friendly', 'Adventure']
description: Start your own Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria with Freddy Fazbear Pizzeria Simulator!

name: God Of Thunder
description: Action! Adventure! Puzzles! Corny humor! God Of Thunder is the full version of a 1994 shareware game that you've probably never heard of. It is now freeware, so have fun.

name: The Parallax Effect
description: You're a survivor of "The Parallax Effect". A government run project which took a dark, unforeseen turn for the worst several years ago. You are now left with no memory and seemingly lost in an abandoned world reclaimed by nature, but you might not be alone...

name: Breathedge
tags: ['Open World Survival Craft', 'Space', 'Survival', 'Singleplayer', 'Sandbox', 'Indie', 'Base Building', 'Sci-fi', 'First-Person', 'Atmospheric', 'Adventure', 'Crafting', 'Open World', 'Exploration', 'Action', 'Early Access', 'Aliens', 'Simulation', 'Action-Adventure', 'Co-op']
description: Survive in outer space! Together with your immortal chicken, discover the truth behind your sudden spaceship crash. Craft tools, pilot vehicles, and even control space stations to survive and explore the wreckage.

name: Spike Volleyball
description: Spikes, blocks, floaters… Master the skills and tactics of indoor volleyball! With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

name: Brutal Alice  -The Handred Day's War-
description: Regional control type strategy simulation.It's a game where 104 bases represented by flags are attacked or attacked and gathered together. There is no accounting element in this workYou can enjoy it completely for free. [/]

name: Pain of War
description: Horror based action game themed during World War. Prepare to know the darkside of it.

name: AchBall
description: AchBall is a casual game in which you hit goals by launching a ball. You score extra points for each time the ball bounces.

name: Golden Hornet
description: Golden Hornet is a retro style twin-stick shooter. Become a pilot of the multipurpose helicopter 'Golden Hornet' — rescue hostages and destroy enemy outposts.

name: Dark Old Sun
description: A shoot'em up, with focus on choice and progressiveness, so you can choose between a wide selection of weapons, and upgrade them becoming way more powerfull as you play.Big multi-phase bosses and a dramatic story.

name: Phasmophobia
description: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost-hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

name: Now Man Flies
description: Travel on an intergalactic highway in search of new planets!

name: Deadly Days
description: Deadly Days is a unique strategic rogue-lite in the zombie apocalypse. Manage and protect a group of survivors and help them to stop the catastrophe. Discover and use a large number of wild and crazy objects, even wilder and crazier survivors, special abilities, and deadly weapons.

name: Lost Grimoires 3: The Forgotten Well
tags: ['Casual', 'Adventure', 'Hidden Object', 'Family Friendly', 'Puzzle', 'Fantasy', 'Magic', 'Short', 'Female Protagonist', 'Colorful', 'Relaxing', 'Point & Click', 'Surreal', 'Story Rich', 'Violent', '2D', 'Singleplayer', 'Mystery', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Atmospheric']
description: Save the kingdom from curse!

name: Neos VR
genres: ['Free to Play', 'Indie', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Animation & Modeling', 'Design & Illustration', 'Education', 'Software Training', 'Utilities', 'Web Publishing', 'Early Access']
tags: ['Free to Play', 'VR', 'Indie', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Multiplayer', 'Animation & Modeling', 'Early Access', 'Utilities', 'Sandbox', 'Design & Illustration', 'Education', 'Software Training', 'Building', 'Level Editor', 'Web Publishing', 'Open World']
description: Welcome to the metaverse! A shared social universe where both casual users and creators coexist. Play and explore with your friends, collaborate with your coworkers or grab powerful building tools and create something new right inside VR.

name: Echoed World
description: Experience the epic journey of Algiz, the architect of life, as he seeks to retrieve his stolen power. But not only has his power been stolen. The whole world he designed is on a brink of destruction.

name: The Song of Terminus  終焉的迴響:護界者之歌
description: A terrible war began from human's desires, causing extreme changes to the world, eventually causing the world tree's energy to become tainted. Two heroes embark on a journey to rejuvenate the world. The player can use different skills by switching between the two heroes facing different enemies.

name: VR Hybrid War 2117 - VR混合战争2117
description: VR Hybrid War 2117 is an intense, action packed space shooting game. It has laser pistols, metallic enemy spiders, explosions, probes flying around trying to seek and destroy you. The mission is to destroy the enemy probe factory, liquid oxygen tank, space ship and a radar.

name: Atlantis VR
description: Enter the underwater world thriving with life! Let the aquatic beings guide you trough the mystery deeps and explore nooks and crannies of beautiful ocean landscape!

name: Hex Commander: Fantasy Heroes
description: Build an army and lead your heroes into battle in an epic fantasy strategy game. Hex Commander: Fantasy Heroes is a turn-based strategy game that will put you right in the middle of war between Humans, Orcs, Goblins, Elves, Dwarves and the undead.

name: Prey: Typhon Hunter
description: Fight overwhelming odds to escape a secret TranStar moon base where the enemies you encounter, the hazards you face, the goals you complete, and the loot you collect are different each time you play. With changing environments as dangerous as they are dynamic, the Mooncrash campaign for Prey will offer a fun, infinitely replayable...

name: Dr. Frank's Build a Boyfriend
description: Dr. Frank's Build-A-Boyfriend is a comedy BL visual-novel mixed with point-and-click adventure elements.

name: Mega Man 11
description: Mega Man is back! The newest entry in this iconic series blends classic, challenging 2D platforming action with a fresh new visual style. The new Double Gear system boosts Mega Man's speed and power for a new twist to the satisfying gameplay the series is known for.

name: Saints Row
description: Welcome to Santo Ileso, a vibrant fictional city in the American Southwest. In a world rife with crime, where lawless factions fight for power, a group of young friends embark on their own criminal venture, as they rise to the top in their bid to become Self Made.

name: Marble Skies
tags: ['Indie', 'Casual', 'Racing', 'Action', '3D Platformer', 'Adventure', 'Strategy', 'Platformer', 'Arcade', 'Controller', 'Time Attack', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Simulation', 'Physics', 'Third Person', 'Retro', 'Singleplayer', 'Family Friendly', 'Early Access', 'Puzzle']
description: Marble Skies is a fast paced 3D-platformer where you control your marble through various levels and try to get the best time for each one. Complete all the levels in your own time, or challenge your friends to get on top of the leaderboards!

name: Chronicles of cyberpunk
description: Chronicles of cyberpunk is an adventure in the city, where power belongs to the Big Brother and his supercomputer. Freedom of actions and thoughts is just an illusion

name: Nonogram - Master's Legacy
description: Master's Legacy - discover all beauty of Nonogram puzzles (multiple game modes, level sizes), master painting skills in Editor and share works with friends in Workshop. Become The Greatest.

name: Wonky Ship
description: You're a daring intergalactic pilot, desperately trying to outmaneuver the ravenous pull of a plasma-fueled black hole. You'll weave, dodge, cuss, flip out, and roll around like you've never done in a video game before. And then you'll die. Often.

name: Progeny VR
description: Progeny is a VR game that takes place during those few seconds between “You Died” and videogame resurrection. It presents players with a sci-fi world, seen only through their deceased character’s memories, and a choice: which of those memories do they take with them into the next life?

name: MewnBase
description: MewnBase is a space-cat survival and base-building game. Scavenge around a barren planet for items to keep you fed. Explore and collect resources. Craft items and grow your base to help you survive.

name: Zap Zap Zombie Cats
description: You are one of the few survivors of a zombie cat-pocalypse. With only your wits, your weapons, and a few turrets, you must defend yourself from the hordes of zombie-cats that come at night. Grenade, blast, shoot, heal, and place traps to survive each wave until safety comes with the sunlight.

name: Slay.one
description: Top-down multiplayer shooter

name: DISTRAINT 2
tags: ['Psychological Horror', 'Horror', 'Story Rich', 'Atmospheric', 'Singleplayer', 'Side Scroller', 'Point & Click', 'Walking Simulator', '2D', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Adventure', 'Surreal', 'Linear', 'Indie', 'Narration', 'Stylized', 'Emotional', 'Minimalist', 'Cute', 'Dark Humor']
description: You are Price, a man who sold his humanity to get a partnership from a leading company: McDade, Bruton & Moore. DISTRAINT 2 follows on from the events of the first game. It's a sinister tale about restoring hope and finding your purpose.

name: Monster Prom
tags: ['Dating Sim', 'Comedy', 'LGBTQ+', 'Multiplayer', 'Choices Matter', 'Visual Novel', 'Indie', 'Funny', 'Simulation', 'Sexual Content', 'Local Multiplayer', 'Fantasy', 'Demons', 'Vampire', 'Story Rich', 'Online Co-Op', 'Zombies', 'Nudity', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Life Sim']
description: You have 3 weeks to get a date for Monster Prom! Go through absurd and funny situations, raise your stats and seduce one of your classmates. Beautiful art, bold, unapologetic dialogue and hard choices make up this Multiplayer (1-4 players) Dating Sim. Be your worst self.

name: COSMONAUT
description: Unravel the mystery surrounding the lost vessel Diogenes. A story-driven retro platformer with elements of horror. Use the zero-g suit to explore the eerie corridors of a derelict ship filled with unknown lifeforms and dark secrets.

name: Achievement Clicker
description: Feel like a real Achievement hunter! Earn Achievements, upgrades and get the most Achievements on steam!

name: Rusty Lake Paradise
description: Rusty Lake Paradise is set on a small remote island which is cursed by the ten plagues of Egypt. Solve all the mysteries of this dark, macabre puzzle adventure. Paradise builds upon the distinctive atmosphere and excitement from the Rusty Lake series.

name: TRATEL64
description: Prepare for an experience unlike anything you've seen before... TRATEL64 (spell it in all caps) is a zany comedy adventure game that's stylized like a fever dream! Watch Tratel go from 0 to 64 over the course of an afternoon (in real time that amounts to 1-2 hours).

name: Deep GachiGASM
description: Fly and destroy slaves, Billy Carringtons, Mark Pulfs, Ricardo Hilses, Kazuas and punish their assholes

name: NEKO-NIN exHeart +PLUS Nachi
description: From developer Whirlpool comes a mini-sequel to NEKO-NIN exHeart featuring the sub-character, Nachi! Impressed by the protagonist's desire to become a better Master for his ninja, Nachi decides to train our hero. What happens when Nachi finds herself glued to our protagonist as well...?

name: Dream Channel
description: Dream Channel is a pilot produced in 2016 (being replaced in 2020) for a branching narrative XR story format (linear & non linear) . Audiences choose which way the story goes - resulting in 9 different story endings. Story branches take also the audience into VR mode to reach a particular ending

name: Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm -
description: Banyu Lintar Angin is a series of experimental illustrations about three siblings, living together independently in a rural Indonesian environment.

name: A Raven Monologue
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Indie', 'Casual', 'Atmospheric', 'Hand-drawn', 'Experimental', 'Relaxing', 'Short', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Story Rich', 'Visual Novel', 'Singleplayer', '2D', 'Point & Click', 'Emotional']
description: A Raven Monologue is a short experimental silent story about a raven that does not know how to croak and his relationship with the people in the town.

name: Dead Frontier 2
tags: ['Free to Play', 'Multiplayer', 'Survival Horror', 'Zombies', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Horror', 'MMORPG', 'Online Co-Op', 'Survival', 'PvE', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Gore', 'Sandbox', 'Trading', 'Inventory Management', 'Violent', 'Atmospheric', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Action', 'RPG']
description: Survival horror MMO. As one of the few survivors of the outbreak, you must scratch a living out of the decaying ruins of society. Scavenge for supplies, improve your skills, and trade with other players. All the while, keeping your eyes peeled for the infected lurking around every corner.

name: 3D Tower
description: Tower 3D is 3D interpretation of the world-famous puzzle game. Now for the completing you need to collect entire rows in two planes and try not to reach the upper limit, crossing which you will lose.

name: Reflex
description: A simple puzzle game. Simple graphics and nice music. Try your mind in more than 70+ levels. They are waiting for you.

name: Perceptions of the Dead
description: Follow three stories set in a world where the dead linger, and things far worse wait beyond the veil.

name: Temtem
tags: ['Creature Collector', 'MMORPG', 'Turn-Based Tactics', 'Character Customization', 'JRPG', 'Collectathon', 'Adventure', 'Anime', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'Exploration', 'PvP', 'Colorful', 'RPG', 'PvE', 'Cute', '3D', 'Third Person', 'Story Rich', 'Top-Down', 'Cartoony']
description: Temtem is a massively multiplayer creature-collection adventure. Seek adventure in the lovely Airborne Archipelago alongside your Temtem squad. Catch every Temtem, battle other tamers, customize your house, join a friend's adventure or explore the dynamic online world.

description: The starry sky spreads far and wide overhead... This story full of love, comedy, and excitement follows our protagonist and his stargazing friends as they grow together. "A Sky Full of Stars" is a coming-of-age astronomy tale by the same team who brought you "If My Heart Had Wings".

tags: ['Free to Play', 'Action', 'Casual', 'Indie', 'Early Access', 'Multiplayer', 'Comedy', 'Family Friendly', 'Memes', '2D', 'Stylized', 'Character Customization', 'Building', 'Tower Defense', 'Puzzle', 'Strategy', 'RPG', 'Funny', 'Gun Customization', 'Massively Multiplayer']
